languages.text: Кучка пленников, последние остатки Конгрегации Хищной звезды, были высажены на небольшой планетоид с малым запасом припасов. Среди уцелевших были лишь дети и старики, чей облик был наименее искажен. Ни одному истинному чудовищу не было даровано милосердие... По крайней мере, так казалось. Генетическое искажение, почти скрывшееся в крови выживших, проявило себя в их потомках, и вскоре под алчным светом чужих звезд родились дети, покрытые лиловым хитином и несущие истину Многорукого Императора на кончиках своих жал-языков.

A handful of prisoners— all that remained of the Congregation of the Ravenous Star — were left on a minor planet with few supplies. The survivors included only children and old men and women whose appearance had the fewest distortions. Not one of the true monsters had been spared... Or so it seemed. The genetic aberration had all but faded away in the blood of the survivors, only to reveal itself again in their offspring. Soon, purple chitin-covered children were born under the greedy light of alien stars, and went on to carry the truth of the Many-Armed Emperor on the tips of their sting-like tongues.
languages.original_text: Кучка пленников, последние остатки Конгрегации Хищной звезды, были высажены на небольшой планетоид с малым запасом припасов. Среди уцелевших были лишь дети и старики, чей облик был наименее искажен. Ни одному истинному чудовищу не было даровано милосердие... По крайней мере, так казалось. Генетическое искажение, почти скрывшееся в крови выживших, проявило себя в их потомках, и вскоре под алчным светом чужих звезд родились дети, покрытые лиловым хитином и несущие истину Многорукого Императора на кончиках своих жал-языков.

traits.locale_text: A handful of prisoners— all that remained of the Congregation of the Ravenous Star — were dropped off on a minor planet with a small quantity of supplies. The survivors only included women, children, and old men whose appearance had the fewest distortions. Not one of the true monsters had been spared... Or so it seemed. The genetic anathema had all but faded away in the blood of the survivors, only to reveal itself again in their offspring. Soon, purple chitin-covered children were born under the greedy light of alien stars, and went on to carry the truth of the Many-Armed Emperor on the tips of their sting-like tongues.

languages.text: Eine Handvoll Gefangene – alles, was von der Kongregation des gefräßigen Sterns geblieben war – wurde auf einem unbedeutenden Planeten mit einigen Vorräten ausgesetzt. Zu den Überlebenden zählten nur Kinder, alte Männer und Frauen, deren Entstellungen vergleichsweise gering waren. Kein einziges der wahren Monster war verschont worden ... Jedenfalls schien es so. Die genetische Abscheulichkeit war im Blut der Überlebenden vergangen, um sich in ihren Nachkommen aufs Neue zu offenbaren. Wenig später wurden die violetten, mit Chitin überzogenen Kinder im gierigen Licht außerirdischer Sterne geboren und trugen die Wahrheit über den vielarmigen Imperator auf ihren stachelartigen Zungen.
languages.original_text: A handful of prisoners— all that remained of the Congregation of the Ravenous Star — were left on a minor planet with few supplies. traits.locale_text: Eine Handvoll Gefangene – alles, was von der Kongregation des gefräßigen Sterns geblieben war – wurde auf einem unbedeutenden Planeten mit einigen Vorräten ausgesetzt. Zu den Überlebenden zählten nur Kinder, alte Männer und Frauen, deren Entstellungen vergleichsweise gering waren. Kein einziges der wahren Monster war verschont worden ... Jedenfalls schien es so. Die genetische Abscheulichkeit war im Blut der Überlebenden vergangen, um sich in ihren Nachkommen aufs Neue zu offenbaren. Wenig später wurden die violetten, mit Chitin überzogenen Kinder im gierigen Licht außerirdischer Sterne geboren und trugen die Wahrheit über den vielarmigen Imperator auf ihren stachelartigen Zungen.

languages.text: Une poignée de prisonniers, seuls rescapés de la congrégation de l'Étoile vorace, fut abandonnée sur une planète mineure avec quelques rares provisions. Les survivants ne comptaient dans leurs rangs que des enfants et des vieillards dont la physionomie ne trahissait que peu de mutations. Pas un seul des véritables monstres n'avait été épargné... en apparence, du moins. En réalité, l'aberration génétique coulait toujours dans les veines des rescapés, et elle refit surface à travers leur progéniture. Bientôt, des enfants à la peau violette couverte d'une carapace chitineuse virent le jour sous la lumière avide d'étoiles reculées et continuèrent à porter la vérité de l'Empereur aux mille bras au bout de leurs langues pareilles à des dards.
languages.original_text: A handful of prisoners— all that remained of the Congregation of the Ravenous Star — were left on a minor planet with few supplies. The survivors included only children and old men and women whose appearance had the fewest distortions. Not one of the true monsters had been spared... Or so it seemed. Les survivants ne comptaient dans leurs rangs que des enfants et des vieillards dont la physionomie ne trahissait que peu de mutations. languages.text: Un puñado de prisioneros, los restos de la Congregación de la Estrella Voraz, fueron abandonados en un planeta menor con escasos suministros... Los supervivientes solo incluían a los ancianos, las mujeres y los niños con el menor número de deformaciones. No había quedado ninguno de los verdaderos monstruos... o eso parecía. Aunque la aberración genética casi había desaparecido de la sangre de los supervivientes, resurgió con fuerza en su progenie. Pronto, niños cubiertos de quitina púrpura nacidos bajo la codiciosa luz de extrañas estrellas propagarían la verdad del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos con sus lenguas aguijoneadoras.
languages.original_text: A handful of prisoners— all that remained of the Congregation of the Ravenous Star — were left on a minor planet with few supplies. The survivors included only children and old men and women whose appearance had the fewest distortions. Not one of the true monsters had been spared... Or so it seemed. languages.text: ほんの一握りの囚人たち…それはすべて鴉星の信徒の残党だった— が、物資もほとんどない小惑星に取り残された。生き残ったのは、子供と、外見上の忌まわしきものが最も少ない置いた男女の身だった。本物の怪物は一人として助からなかった...そう、考えられていた。遺伝子上のアナテマは生存者の血の中で消え去ったが、それは子孫たちに再び表出するまでのことだった。やがて紫色のキチン質の肌で覆われた子供たちが異星の飢えた光の下に生まれ、棘のような舌先に多腕の皇帝の真実を宿すことになる。
languages.original_text: A handful of prisoners— all that remained of the Congregation of the Ravenous Star — were left on a minor planet with few supplies. The survivors included only children and old men and women whose appearance had the fewest distortions. Not one of the true monsters had been spared... Or so it seemed. The genetic aberration had all but faded away in the blood of the survivors, only to reveal itself again in their offspring. Soon, purple chitin-covered children were born under the greedy light of alien stars, and went on to carry the truth of the Many-Armed Emperor on the tips of their sting-like tongues.

traits.locale_text: ほんの一握りの囚人たち…それはすべて鴉星の信徒の残党だった— が、物資もほとんどない小惑星に取り残された。生き残ったのは、子供と、外見上の忌まわしきものが最も少ない置いた男女の身だった。本物の怪物は一人として助からなかった...そう、考えられていた。遺伝子上のアナテマは生存者の血の中で消え去ったが、それは子孫たちに再び表出するまでのことだった。やがて紫色のキチン質の肌で覆われた子供たちが異星の飢えた光の下に生まれ、棘のような舌先に多腕の皇帝の真実を宿すことになる。

languages.text: 为数不多的囚犯，也就是饥渴之星教会残存的所有成员，被丢弃在了一颗资源匮乏的小行星上。只有那些外表几乎没有任何突变的孩子与老人得到了赦免，至于变成怪物的人，则被彻底消灭了……或者说，那些怪物只是看起来像是被被彻底消灭了。尽管那些幸存者的血液中几乎没有包含任何基因诅咒，但他们的后代再次带上了这样的诅咒。没过多久，在群星饥渴的光芒之下，新一代的子嗣诞生了。他们身上覆满了紫色的几丁质，满是尖刺的舌头诉说着四臂神皇的真理。
languages.original_text: A handful of prisoners— all that remained of the Congregation of the Ravenous Star — were left on a minor planet with few supplies. The survivors included only children and old men and women whose appearance had the fewest distortions. Not one of the true monsters had been spared... Or so it seemed. Soon, purple chitin-covered children were born under the greedy light of alien stars, and went on to carry the truth of the Many-Armed Emperor on the tips of their sting-like tongues.

languages.text: Doymak Bilmez Yıldız Cemaati'nden geriye kalan birkaç mahkûm, az miktarda kaynakla birlikte önemsiz bir gezegene terk edildi. Sağ kalanlar, yalnızca görünümlerinde fazla bozulma meydana gelmemiş çocuklar ve ihtiyar erkeklerle kadınlardan oluşmaktaydı. Hakiki canavarlardan tek bir tanesi bile sağ bırakılmadı... Belki de öyle sanıldı. Sağ kalanların kanındaki tüm genetik sapkı zamanla geçip gitse de kendini çocuklarında tekrar gösterdi. Kısa süre içinde yabancı yıldızların tamahkâr ışıkları altında mor kitinle kaplı çocuklar doğdu. Bu çocuklar, iğneyi andıran dillerinden Çok Kollu İmparator'a dair hakikati hiç düşürmediler.
languages.original_text: A handful of prisoners— all that remained of the Congregation of the Ravenous Star — were left on a minor planet with few supplies. The survivors included only children and old men and women whose appearance had the fewest distortions. Not one of the true monsters had been spared... Or so it seemed. The genetic aberration had all but faded away in the blood of the survivors, only to reveal itself again in their offspring. Soon, purple chitin-covered children were born under the greedy light of alien stars, and went on to carry the truth of the Many-Armed Emperor on the tips of their sting-like tongues.
